r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * THIS RELEASE BREAKS PRIOR FUNCTIONS. Read the release notes below and see the documentation website. * New documentation website at http://wiki.ciaweb.net/view.php?wiki=Text_Wiki * The $rules property is completely changed, see the website for new format * Added setRuleConf() method to set rule configuration values (no longer Text_Wiki class properties)
